verses.text: Great \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* greatly \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* praised, \w In|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* city \w of|strong="H1121"\w* our God, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7141"\w* holy mountain.

Beautiful \w in|strong="H3068"\w* elevation, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* joy \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* whole earth, \w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Zion, \add on\add* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sides \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* north, \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* King.
God \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* himself known \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* palaces \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* refuge.
\w For|strong="H3045"\w*, lo, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* kings assembled \w themselves|strong="H3045"\w*, \w They|strong="H3045"\w* passed by together.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* amazed; \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* dismayed, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* hasted \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

Trembling took hold \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, Pain, \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w in|strong="H7200"\w* travail.
\w With|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* east wind Thou breakest \w the|strong="H3205"\w* ships \w of|strong="H3205"\w* Tarshish.

As \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have heard, \w so|strong="H7307"\w* have \w we|strong="H3068"\w* seen \w In|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* hosts, \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* city \w of|strong="H7307"\w* our God: God \w will|strong="H7307"\w* establish \w it|strong="H7665"\w* forever. \qs Selah\qs*

\w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* thought \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindness, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* midst \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* temple.

\w As|strong="H2617"\w* \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w thy|strong="H7130"\w* name, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, So \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w thy|strong="H7130"\w* praise \w unto|strong="H2617"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* ends \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H7130"\w* earth: \w Thy|strong="H7130"\w* right hand \w is|strong="H2617"\w* full \w of|strong="H7130"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w mount|strong="H4390"\w* Zion \w be|strong="H8034"\w* glad, \w Let|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H8034"\w* Judah rejoice, \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* judgments.

Walk \w about|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* go \w round|strong="H3063"\w* \w about|strong="H2022"\w* \w her|strong="H1323"\w*; Number \w the|strong="H8055"\w* towers \w thereof|strong="H4941"\w*;

Mark ye well \w her|strong="H5608"\w* bulwarks; Consider \w her|strong="H5608"\w* palaces: That ye may \w tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w it|strong="H5437"\w* \w to|strong="H5437"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* generation following.

\w For|strong="H4616"\w* \w this|strong="H4616"\w* God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* God \w forever|strong="H1755"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* ever: \w He|strong="H3820"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w our|strong="H7896"\w* guide \add even\add* \w unto|strong="H3820"\w* death.
